welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Culver City, where charm meets creativity! Explore our bustling city known for its vibrant art scene, delicious food, and friendly community. Enjoy your stay and discover the wonders of Culver City."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and some domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with modern facilities for passenger convenience.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to stay connected.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves smaller airlines and regional flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport after agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Monte Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at El Monte Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
